item.description:
YEAR END FINALE!! Afterwork Mixer this Thursday December 7th at
AQUA & THE VAULT (2 VENUES)

For young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Financial District 6:00-9:30pm.

Th Afterwork mixer returns this Thursday December 7th. This time we are taking the party to Aqua and the Vault, 2 great financial district hotspots right across the street from each other. This is the final event of the year so what better way to come out this Thurs and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for the holiday season and the start of 2007!

Meeting Details: We'll initally meet at Aqua before heading over to the Vault.
Meet & mingle from 6-7pm at AQUA Lounge (120 Water St. between Congress & Broad st ). If unsure of this location I highly recommend going online (google) to get a better idea for directions. We will meet near the FRONT of the bar at Aqua. Then head over to The Vault around 7:00pm. The Vault is quite possibly the most entertaining, liveliest, and crowded afterwork party in Boston, therefore I HIGHLY RECOMMEND meeting us at Aqua first as it will be very CROWDED at the Vault and finding new faces will be nearly impossible.
My picture is on the left hand side of the website under the Assistant Organizer section. Also my phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving. Happy Holidays, look forward to seeing you all there!

Steven


Public Transportation:

Green Line to Govt Center
Red Line to Park St /Downtown Crossing
Orange Line to State St/Downtown Crossing
Blue Line to State St/Govt Center/Aqaurium

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Seasons Greetings: Afterwork Mixer Year End Finale at Aqua & the Vault!!
